item.description:
Location: SECOND FLOOR of Finale in Brookline's Coolidge Corner
Time: 1 - 3 pm

Agenda

Introductions
20 mins.

Community Solar Challenge updates
Various communities are working toward the Community Solar Challenge which has a deadline of April 30. We'll discuss how that's going, and trade field notes.
30 minutes

Green Jobs
We'll review some upcoming events, such as D2EBoston, the MA Green Jobs Coalition (MAGJC), and MassPowerShift . Discuss how to support the cause.
20 minutes

Cape Wind review
I went to the public hearing in Boston. I'd like to talk about that.
10 mins.

Potluck. What comes up, comes up.
30 mintues.



Location Note: I'm always looking for a good location, preferably one that minimizes the group's driving. If you can suggest a place, please do. Meanwhile, I've selected the Finale in Brookline's Cooledge Corner. It's just a short walk from the MBTA's Coolidge Corner stop which is served by the Green (C) Line and Bus 66.
item.name: March Meetup
